website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy go kart-style pedal car than can handle a wagon and tough terrain.
pros: Can be pedaled forward or backward
Air-up wheels like a bike to give a better and more versatile ride
The seat can adjust backward and forward to grow with your child, or to fit different sized kids
An older child can still use and enjoy this car
cons: The pedals are a little short for this car to go up hills very easily

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing- 2 months waiting to get this right
customer_reviews.text: After buying 2 of these, I found the 2d one didn't have the right wheel for the spindle. I notified the company and they asked for pics. I sent pics. After 45 days, they sent the correct wheel- but they did NOT send the COMPLETE wheel. The wheel bearings for the wheel were not included with the correct wheel. 2 months after purchase and my kid is still not riding this. At this rate, he'll outgrow the damn thing before it's fixed. Also, they run small, so if you're kid is older than 6 or 7, beware that he/she may outgrow it soon (even when the seat's fully adjusted out).

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for young kids

He could not stop it because the brake is the pedal and it’s very heavy. The weight of this thing keeps it moving. My son is 45lb. customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Well built four wheel bike. All parts are of high quality materials. Rides very smooth. Just make sure your child wears a helmet. If they are riding at a high speed and cut the wheel all the way too quickly it's possible the bike can roll over. I personally love the design and build quality of this Berg Buddy. Get it for your kid, you will love it.

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if my daughter would "take" to this as her seventh birthday gift (her main present). I was able to quickly assemble it (tools were included). It took less than ten minutes. She absolutely loved it. She rode it for almost an hour in the dark (supervised, naturally). I was very surprised at the build quality and smoothness of the ride. I highly recommend it!

product_meta.title: Berg Buddy Pedal Go Kart
product_meta.description: Let your kid enjoy the coming years with the Berg Buddy White Pedal Go Kart Four-Wheeler. This kiddie pedal kart has an adjustable steering wheel thats capable of adapting to your childs changing height. It also has a BFR-HUB system which allows your kid to immediately stop the vehicle once they stop pedaling. This amazing system also allows your kid to move back when they decide to pedal backwards. For a comfortable ride, this go kart has a swing axle that accounts for irregularities your child might encounter on the road. The Berg Buddy White Pedal Go Kart is perfect for children ages 3 to 8.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 44ft D x 26in W x 25in H/ Weight: 40 lbs. Recommended for Ages: 3-8 Years/ Max Weight: 150 lbs
Features Powder Coated Tubular Steel Frame- Which Offers Strength Without Undue Weight

Includes BFR Hub (Brake, Forward, Reverse) Which Allows Driver to Pedal Forward, Coast With Pedals Static, and Pedal Back Slightly to Pedal In Reverse/ Coaster Brake/ Swing Axle-Allows Front of Frame to Pivot for Control on Uneven Surfaces and Less Stress on the Beautiful Robotic Welds
Comes With Pneumatic Tires- Which Provide a Controlled Ride With Superior Traction and Durability
Features Sealed Bearings in Each Wheel Keep Kart Rolling Effortlessly- No Need to Lube the Wheels
